Class OneStepAlien

  • java.lang.Object
    • BattleFieldElement
      • Alien
        • OneStepAlien

  • public class OneStepAlien
extends Alien
    OneStepAlien is a concrete subclass of Alien representing aliens; all aliens of this type move like a single entity from right to left or from left to right (they never go up or down, and at the beginning they move from left to right). When an alien of this type reaches the border, the whole army changes its direction of movement.
